title: Admin
description: This role will be responsible for providing comprehensive administrative support to the team and management. This role involves handling day-to-day operations, ensuring proper documentation, coordinating communications, and maintaining organized workflows. The ideal candidate is professional, dependable, and capable of managing multiple priorities in a collaborative and evolving setting.
requirements: 2–4 years in admin, coordination, or similar roles
Strong organization and multitasking
Clear written and verbal communication
Skilled with Google Workspace and project tools
Detail-oriented, reliable, able to handle priorities
Team or online community experience is a plus
Professional and proactive

title: Mobile Developer
description: We are seeking a Senior Mobile Developer to design, build, and maintain mobile applications for Android and iOS. The role involves leading the development lifecycle, ensuring code quality, optimizing performance, and delivering applications that meet business and user needs.
requirements: Experience in Android and iOS development
Skilled in Flutter, React Native, Swift, or Kotlin
Familiar with mobile UI/UX principles
Experience with REST APIs
Proficient in Git
Owns and works on a Mac
Able to work independently and remotely

title: n8n Developer
description: Deploy a self-hosted n8n instance, set up CI/CD for automatic updates, ensure data persistence & HTTPS, and support queue mode with Redis.
requirements: Docker, CI/CD Pipeline

title: AI Engineer & Automation Architect
description: We’re looking for a developer who can design, build, and scale AI-powered systems—from backend services to automation workflows. You’ll be responsible for architecting and deploying production-grade solutions that integrate LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to deliver intelligent automation at scale.
requirements: Strong coding skills in Python and/or Node.js (TypeScript)
Experience with building and deploying services using FastAPI or Express, Postgres/SQL, Redis, and Docker
Solid knowledge of APIs, schema/versioning, and webhooks
Hands-on experience with LLM production (OpenAI or similar, vector stores, prompt versioning, etc.)
Focus on reliability with unit testing, alerting, and understanding security/privacy concerns
Excellent English communication skills and an ability to work independently

title: Admin Assistant -  Volunteer (Developer & Client Sourcing)
description: We are looking for a proactive Volunteer Admin & Outreach Assistant to support our talent sourcing and client outreach efforts. This role is perfect for someone eager to gain hands-on experience in administration, recruitment, and business development within a startup environment.
requirements: • Post developer opportunities across online platforms
• Find and connect with potential developers (volunteer or paid)
• Search for and reach out to potential clients who need development work
• Share Codebility's services and generate interest
• If a lead becomes a paying client, you receive a commission
WHO THIS IS FOR:
• Someone who wants experience in outreach, lead generation, or startup growth
• You’re active online and good at communicating
• You’re motivated by results and want to grow your skills
• You understand this is unpaid unless clients are secured
COMPENSATION:
• No base pay or fixed salary
• Volunteer experience only unless you help secure paying clients
• For every confirmed paying client you bring in, you will earn a commission (details discussed upon selection)

title: CMS Developer
description: We’re looking for a skilled CMS Developer with expertise in WordPress and Shopify to design, develop, and maintain dynamic, user-friendly websites and e-commerce solutions. This role offers the opportunity to work on diverse projects, optimize performance, and create impactful digital experiences for a wide range of clients.
requirements: 2–4 years of experience in WordPress and/or Shopify development
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Shopify
Experience with custom themes, plugins/apps, and API integrations
Familiar with responsive design and SEO best practices
Ability to troubleshoot, debug, and deliver solutions quickly on demand
Able to work independently and communicate effectively remotely
